Articles.Content:
I've been playing the demo for about two weeks, and today I finally managed to successfully put Jeb on the Mun and bring him home safely.

Many Kermen perished in previous attempts. Their sacrifice will not be forgotten.

On the way home, Jeb was so excited that he dove from the capsule at about 100m and had a chillaxing swim!

Oh, that crazy Jeb...

Welcome to the forums!

An congratulations on your first Mun landing!

Congratulations on your first Mun landing! And welcome to the community!

p.s: Try exploring other planets and moons
